import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import './StoreDashboard.css'; const StoreDashboard = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user') || '{}'); return (

Store Dashboard

Logged in: {user.userName || 'User'} {user.role ? `Role: ${user.role}` : ''}
navigate('/stores')}>

Master

Manage master data like stores, categories, brands, sizes

navigate('/transactions')}>

Transaction

Perform store transactions (coming soon)

navigate('/reports')}>

Reports

View store and sales reports (coming soon)

); }; export default StoreDashboard;
